People also born into scientologist families with mental illness are not allowed to be given medication which is not only harmful for them but for others such as the case of Jeremy Perkins who murdered his mother by stabbing her 77 times. They also charge for membership this is simply because they can. Things which scientologists have done can harm our nation and for our nations sake it should be illegal to follow this "religion"
